author: Chute, Anthony, d. 1595?
publisher: Printed for William Barlow, and are to be sold at his shop in Gracious-street,
notes: Caption title: The destinct and seuerall opinions of the late, and best phisitions that haue written of the nature of tabacco.
Attributed to Chute by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
